channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bus stop pole leaning badly, 27th November
item.description:
1600GLT0067 The Leigh corner of Church Lane Pole only recently been put in Has been hit by something. Pole loose in ground

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury

item.title: Abandoned motorbike, 27th November
item.description:
Pittville Mews - short narrow access road to rear of properties on Pittville Lawn and Evesham Road. Motorbike parked on double yellow lines for past 4 years at least without moving. Obviously not driveable. Hazard to large vehicles such as waste collection lorries reversing down road. Still has registration plates on bike if you want to know that can be given to you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Pittville Mews, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ringway barriers, weeds and rubbish on pavement, 27th November
item.description:
Directly outside no 16 all saints road. Been there since the summer. Weeds getting worse and barrier often messed with. Council says issue solved case closed, unfortunately it does not appear that way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.description:
Large pothole in the road surface outside 138 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham. Poses a significant danger to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 138, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree maintenance on Milton Road, 27th November
item.description:
We have had a structural engineer out to our house (57 Milton Road) to look at cracking in the internal and external walls. It is the view of the engineer that there is some shifting of foundations, due to the clay on which these houses are built, and the dry summer we have had. However, he also said the large tree outside our property will be contributing to the dryness as the roots will be sucking up the moisture in the ground. He recommended that the tree be attended to; trimming or crowning it would reduce its water requirements and help our situation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Milton Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lorry backed down courtfield drive ober grass verge and into fence and signage, 27th November
item.description:
338 london road - courtfield. A superdrug lorry at 10.40pm last night couldn't get past the diversion and had to turn around down Courtfield Drive - they went over the grass verge and into the courtfield drive sign and damaged fence and wheelie bin/. The driver drove off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Courtfield Drive, Cheltenham

item.title: The drain from the pond is blocked, the water then goes onto the road, during the cold weather the water freezes making a sheet of ice which is very high risk of accidents. Consistently over the last few years the road at the motorway bridge floods to a depth that is impassable (see last photograph) note this also backs up to Monks Lane., 27th November
item.description:
W3W ///buyers.wide.asked Note the track is a Byway Open to All Traffic and is impassable

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashchurch Rural, Tewkesbury

item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Abandoned caravan in front of St Mary’s Mission, 27th November
item.description:
White caravan number plate FD090SW has been in the council owned car park in front of St Mary’s Mission, Winston Churchill Memorial Garden, entrance from Lower High St for at least a week now. No car attached or with corresponding number plate in car park. One flat tyre. Possible condensation on windows so have also reported to Streetlink in case anyone is staying in it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 442, High Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
